Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Ramayana stamps were released three years ago, as mentioned in the expert's verdict.

Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the stamps by attributing their release to Prime Minister Modi, despite them being released in 2017.
Understate: No instances of understating bias are evident in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not verifying the accuracy of the information before sharing it on social media. It falsely attributes the release of the stamps to Prime Minister Modi without proper verification.
